body.p: The amendments in 2011 made the following changes to the recognition requirements:

li.p: immediate recognition—elimination of the corridor (paragraphs BC70–BC72).
redefining the components of defined benefit cost (paragraphs BC73–BC87).
recognition of the remeasurements component in other comprehensive income (paragraphs BC88–BC100).
